page.title: 12Law and Order in Rhos 2
page.content: There most frequent call out is for vandalism,particularly in the areas were offenders cannot be seen by the public. To prevent this a crimewatch campain has been set up by the local newspaper,'The Evening Leader'. Also there is a community police officer who keeps watch for vandals and other trouble makers suchas burglars.His name is Mr.Ken Davies.The community policeman tries to get to know the people better, especeally the children so that they will not be frightened to report any disturbance.They will know who to go to immediately. Although Rhos is a quiet village there is a fair amount of crime(particularly theft,vandalism and house squabbles!) but the police cope with it very well and are highly respected by most people in the community.
